about_the_game:
The Crimson Lyre is an immersive first person RPG adventure into a dangerous fantasy land. Build your character, solve problems your way, and retrieve... The Crimson Lyre!

The Story So Far...

The Crim, a formidable faction of bandits and cultists, wreak havoc across the land, inching closer to your homeland with every passing day. Your father, a renowned scholar of magical artifacts, departed on a quest in search of an artifact rumored to possess unparalleled power capable of halting the Crim's relentless march.

Weeks have elapsed since his departure, and rumors abound that the Crim have halted their advance momentarily, trailing your father into the depths of ancient woods in pursuit of the same artifact. Now, compelled by duty and urgency, you must embark on a perilous journey to locate your father and secure the artifact, the Lyre, before the Crim seize it.

Gameplay:

The Crimson Lyre is an RPG with loot, skills, and plenty of lore to discover. Play it your way with multiple solutions to problems:
Are you a stealthy character that slips past obstacles?
Do you face challenges head on with a sword?
Or perhaps a more subtle approach thinking your way to victory?

It's up to you, and in any game you aren't limited to one approach. Try all of the methods, or focus on one. The game is about exploration and experimentation.
